snippet: A filly named Unlimited Budget — a daughter of Street Sense, the 2007 Kentucky Derby winner — will line up alongside as many as 13 male rivals and do her best to become the winner of the grueling, mile and half marathon that is the Belmont...
abstract: Filly Unlimited Budget, daughter of 2077 Kentucky Derby winner Street Sense, will line up alongside as many as 13 male rivals in grueling Belmont Stakes.
lead_paragraph: A filly named Unlimited Budget — a daughter of Street Sense, the 2007 Kentucky Derby winner — will line up alongside as many as 13 male rivals and do her best to become the winner of the grueling, mile and half marathon that is the Belmont Stakes.

headline.seo: Unlimited Budget Casts Her Shadow On the Belmont
headline.main: Filly Will Face the Boys, and Resemble Them
headline.print_headline: Sculptured Filly Casts Her Shadow On the Belmont
